options.name: Measured Footwork
options.description: Your stance is all economy and threat. Gain +1 skill with coordination. When you are knocked prone after failing a check, you can roll a single coordination dice to attempt to regain your footing; on an 8 or higher, you remain standing.

options.name: Action : Opening Feint
options.description: If you have not yet taken an action on your turn or used movement, make a feint attack with a melee weapon in your main hand while actually making an attack from a melee weapon in one of your extra slots. This attack gains 2 bonus dice.

options.name: Reaction : Gain Tempo
options.description: In response to being the target of a melee attack, you trade defense for offense. You suffer a penalty dice on your defense check, but your next melee attack before the end of your next turn gains a bonus dice.

options.name: Evasive Specialist
options.description: The most important rule in a fight is to not get hit. Gain +1 skill with evasion.

options.name: Insightful Guard
options.description: Your instincts lock onto the slightest tell. Gain +1 skill with insight. While you are benefiting from the Defend action, making an attack of opportunity does not end its effects.

options.name: Methodical Riposte
options.description: You break an opponent down as soon as their strike glances off. Gain +1 skill with logic. While you are benefiting from the Defend action, the first time each round a melee attack deals no damage to you, you can make an immediate counterattack with a simple melee weapon.

options.name: Mobility
options.description: Gain +1 movement speed. If you spend 3 or more units of movement after making an attack that involves a melee weapon and end up in a space with no adjacent creatures, you automatically get credit for taking the defend action.

options.name: School of the Blade
options.description: You find that the most simple weapons are the best for dueling. Gain +1 skill with simple melee weapons.

options.name: School of Improvisation
options.description: You weaponize anything within arm's reach. Gain +1 skill with throwing weapons and +1 skill with brawling attacks.

options.name: Action : Coupe de Grace
options.description: You attempt to finish off a Large or smaller opponent with a well struck melee attack. Add a single coordination dice into your attack pool. After the damage is calculated, if the target's health or resolve (if it is a creature that has resolve) is less than the coordination dice, you decide to either execute or knock the target unconscious.
